line_1: And greater cunning, forc'd the rest to serve
line_2: Till some in length of time, of stronger nerve,
YOUR Lordship here then may observe,

line_1: From him let constant Lovers learn to serve:
line_2: This Story, in thy Annals, still preserve,

line_1: Him dully they Adore, him blindly Serve,
line_2: Some while they're Sots, and other while they Starve.

line_1: "And ever will its tender mansion serve,
line_2: " Nor can it from thee this reproach deserve
